tool.name: isa_get_study_factors
tool.description: Get list of study factors for a ISA study

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS1.

validator.message: ID must look like a valid MTBLS identifier

tool.help:
========================================= Get list of study factors for a ISA study =========================================
This tool gets the list of study factors from a ISA study. It extracts the factors from the ISA-Tab metadata.
----- Input -----
ISA-Tab input source ==================== Choose an input source, either direct from Metabolights or from an ISA-Tab history item that has already been downloaded or created in Galaxy.
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= If the input source is Metabolights, then provide the MTBLS identifier available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS1.
ISA-Tab datatype history item ============================= If the input source is an ISA-Tab history item, select from existing data history items. ISA-Tab items can be created by using the Metabolights downloader or the ISA-Tab metadata creation tools.
------ Output ------
List of study factors as JSON =============================
A list of factor names as a JSON list. e.g.
::
[ "replicate", "genotype" ]
